item.title: Chinese Poem from 1500 Years Ago: An Attractive Man
item.description: Love is always the topic for us all. It repeats again and again during thousands of years of our journey. It’s simple like that, fall in love, together and apart. maybe happy, maybe painful, kinda experience.
